name: Waveform Animator
description: Embiggens simple waveforms. Recreates a popular analogue wave multiplier circuit using comparators and LFOs to turn simple inputs (e.g., sawtooth) into richer, fatter sounds. Based on disting mk4 algorithm.

parameters.name: Threshold
parameters.description: Sets the comparator threshold.

parameters.name: Track
parameters.description: Whether to track the input signal amplitude for square wave generation.

parameters.name: Amplitude
parameters.description: The square wave amplitude, if tracking is not being used.

parameters.name: Squares
parameters.description: The number of square waves (comparators) to generate.

parameters.name: Separation
parameters.description: The spread of the actual comparator thresholds around the value set by 'Threshold'.

parameters.name: Mix
parameters.description: Output mix (-100% = input only, 0% = full input & squares, 100% = squares only).

parameters.name: LFO rate
parameters.description: The LFO rate, scaled exponentially from 0.2Hz to 20Hz.

parameters.name: LFO depth
parameters.description: The LFO depth modulating comparator thresholds.

parameters.name: Input
parameters.description: The first input bus to process.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: The number of busses to process, starting from the Input (e.g., 2 for stereo).

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: The first output bus.

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector.

parameters.name: Threshold input
parameters.description: The CV input bus for the comparator threshold.
